name: Confession (Transylvanian Blacksmiths)
description:
As a crime journalist, Arthur, explore his childhood home while also battling his unstable mind . Uncover dark secrets about his past and fight your way in through the dark rooms of the house.

Paranoia 

Arthur's mind is unstable, he is constantly afraid which causes him to become extremely paranoid causing him a loss of vision and hearing things that may or may not be real. Paranoia will randomly trigger throughout the game, you are never safe.

Power Ups

You can find three kinds of power ups to help you through the journey. 

Increased movement speed to help you better kite your enemies.

Increased health to help you tank more damage against a larger group of enemies.

Increased bullet damage to help you kill your enemies faster so that it gives you more breathing space to explore.

Boss Battle & Journal

At the end of each level fight against a more bigger and powerful enemy, defeating him will grant you a new journal entry containing a small piece of Arthur's story.
